title: Amec Construction
author: ''
date: '2022-10-25'
slug: amec_construction
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $137.9K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Amec Construction. The average
  contract duration was 0.46 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $688.4K. The longest
  contract was 1.16 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.4M.
lookup_name: 'AMEC CONSTRUCTION'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '137.9K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '29%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '17%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.5'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '594.7K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.46'
s421_mean_contract_value: '688.4K'
s425_max_duration: '1.16'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.4M'
---
